properties.areaDesc: Southern Hidalgo; Inland Kenedy; Coastal Kenedy; Brooks; Northern Hidalgo
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 9 at 4:16PM CST until January 10 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Brooks, Inland Kenedy, Southern Hidalgo, Coastal
Kenedy and Northern Hidalgo Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 AM to 8 PM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor structural damage, such as metal
siding, may be possible due to these high winds. Unsecured
lightweight items, including remaining holiday decorations,
could blow away.
properties.instruction:
High profile or light weight vehicles will be difficult to
drive...especially on bridges or overpasses and in cross winds.
Secure loose items.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM CST FRIDAY
